entry.title: Ukraine Strikes Show Impact of New Weapons
entry.content: Ukrainian forces struck an air-defense system in Russian-occupied territory in the east of the country, in the latest sign of how long-range artillery sent by the West is shifting the war’s calculus.

entry.title: Sri Lanka's Debt Crisis Tests China's Role as Financier to Poor Countries
entry.content: Developing world faces a credit crunch, but the biggest lender of all has been slow to cooperate with Western-style rescues.

entry.title: 12 Hours of Misery at One of the World's Busiest Airports
entry.content: A recent day at the London airport saw hundreds of delayed flights, lines of travelers spilling into each other and a mysteriously closed lost-luggage desk. “This is the new normal.”
